All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
GetUserInput
The GetUserInput class prompts the user to view or modify customer records.
ModifyCustomers
ModifyCustomers.java Reads customers.xml, appends new fields to each customer, and saves to customer_modified.xml.
ViewCustomers
ViewCustomers.java Parses customers.xml and prints formatted report to console.
